info.name: Roll20, Status Icons, show a subset
info.description: Modifies: Status Icons popup for tokens. This hides the icons we don't use, making it faster to find and select the ones we need. All icons listed, so you can modify it to suit your own game.
info.additionalInfo: The subset of status icons for your game probably isn't this subset. Install this, then make a copy and modify it for your icons. I've added code for all of the icons so this should be clear, but feel free to post questions or suggestions.
